tweet: You want your transactions to be as small as possible given your respective design constraints. Adding more design constraints (e.g. better privacy ala Monero) will necessarily result in much larger transactions.

Why would you need privacy coins like Monero $XMR when you can make private transactions between any token?   Private $btc? ✔️ Private $eth? ✔️  Private Swap technology is here!  Powered by $NIX & $KMD

The crypto world is still like High School. You have the cool kids (Bitcoin), the hanger-ons (Litecoin), the druggie slackers (Monero), and the nerds (Dash, Ethereum).  Guess which kids end up most successful in real life?
